// {{{ NX.Array.lastIndexOf

/**
 * @class NX.Array
 */

/**
 * @method lastIndexOf
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(array, item, from) {

    var len = array.length,
        from = Number(from);

    if(isNaN(from)) {

        from = len - 1;

    } else {

        from = (from < 0) ? Math.ceil(from) : Math.floor(from);

        if(from < 0) {

            from += len;

        } else if(from >= len) {

            from = len - 1;

        }
    }

    return array.lastIndexOf(item, from);
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
